title: Berner Verbals to SIU
text:
Story Created: Oct 2, 2015 at 3:36   Oct 2, 2015 at 3:56 PM CDT 
WSIL -- The Football Salukis are keeping one of the area's top talents close to home next season, as Chester senior Jordan Berner has verbally committed to play for the Dawgs. The 6-5, 250 pound senior plays linebacker and tight end for the Yellow Jackets, but he does a bit of everything though. Berner averages nearly nine yards a carry and 22 yards a reception. He has scored five touchdowns through five games this season. Defensively, Berner has 33 tackles, two interceptions, a forced fumble and a fumble recovery. Berner and the 5-0 Jackets host Carmi-White County Friday night.
